short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the Leiden University Libraries Catalogue at any moment, without leaving your current page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover Knowledge Effortlessly with the Leiden Search Assistant!

Imagine having instant access to top academic resources right from your browserâ€”no extra steps required. With the Leiden Search Assistant, you can seamlessly search the Leiden University Library Catalogue, Web of Science, Google Scholar, WorldCat, and PubMed without navigating away from your current page.

Simply click on the extension, type your query, choose your preferred resource, and unlock a world of scholarly information in seconds.

Highlight & Search with Ease
Find an interesting term or concept while reading? Just select it, right-click, and dive into what Leiden University Libraries and other leading resources have to offer. Make your research faster, simpler, and more efficient with Leiden Search Assistant. Install it today and start exploring smarter!
